00035 #include <am_demod.h>

00043 PRIVATE void init_pll( AMD am, REAL samprate, REAL freq, REAL lofreq,
00044                        REAL hifreq, REAL bandwidth )
00045 {
00046     REAL fac = ( REAL ) ( TWOPI / samprate );
00047 
00048     am->pll.freq.f = freq * fac;
00049     am->pll.freq.l = lofreq * fac;
00050     am->pll.freq.h = hifreq * fac;
00051     am->pll.phs = 0.0;
00052     am->pll.delay = cxJ;
00053 
00054     am->pll.iir.alpha = bandwidth * fac;    /* arm filter */
00055     am->pll.alpha = am->pll.iir.alpha * 0.3f;   /* pll bandwidth */
00056     am->pll.beta = am->pll.alpha * am->pll.alpha * 0.25f;   /* second order term */
00057     am->pll.fast_alpha = am->pll.alpha;
00058 }
00059 
00060 PRIVATE void pll( AMD am, COMPLEX sig )
00061 {
00062     COMPLEX z =
00063         Cmplx( ( REAL ) cos( am->pll.phs ), ( REAL ) sin( am->pll.phs ) );
00064     REAL diff;
00065 
00066     am->pll.delay.re = z.re * sig.re + z.im * sig.im;
00067     am->pll.delay.im = -z.im * sig.re + z.re * sig.im;
00068     diff = Cmag( sig ) * ATAN2( am->pll.delay.im, am->pll.delay.re );
00069 
00070     am->pll.freq.f += am->pll.beta * diff;
00071 
00072     if ( am->pll.freq.f < am->pll.freq.l )
00073         am->pll.freq.f = am->pll.freq.l;
00074     if ( am->pll.freq.f > am->pll.freq.h )
00075         am->pll.freq.f = am->pll.freq.h;
00076 
00077     am->pll.phs += am->pll.freq.f + am->pll.alpha * diff;
00078 
00079     while ( am->pll.phs >= TWOPI )
00080         am->pll.phs -= ( REAL ) TWOPI;
00081     while ( am->pll.phs < 0 )
00082         am->pll.phs += ( REAL ) TWOPI;
00083 }
00084 
00085 PRIVATE REAL dem( AMD am )
00086 {
00087     am->lock.curr = 0.999 * am->lock.curr + 0.001 * fabs( am->pll.delay.im );
00088     am->lock.prev = am->lock.curr;
00089     am->dc = 0.9999f * am->dc + 0.0001f * am->pll.delay.re;
00090     return am->pll.delay.re - am->dc;
00091 }

00094 
00095 /* public */
00096 
00097 /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00098 
00099 void AMDemod( AMD am )
00100 {
00101     int i;
00102     REAL demout;
00103 
00104     switch ( am->mode )
00105     {
00106     case SAMdet:
00107         for ( i = 0; i < am->size; i++ )
00108         {
00109             pll( am, CXBdata( am->ibuf, i ) );
00110             demout = dem( am );
00111             CXBdata( am->obuf, i ) = Cmplx( demout, demout );
00112         }
00113         break;
00114     case AMdet:
00115         for ( i = 0; i < am->size; i++ )
00116         {
00117             am->lock.curr = Cmag( CXBdata( am->ibuf, i ) );
00118             am->dc = 0.9999f * am->dc + 0.0001f * am->lock.curr;
00119             am->smooth =
00120                 0.5f * am->smooth + 0.5f * ( am->lock.curr - am->dc );
00121             /* demout = am->smooth; */
00122             CXBdata( am->obuf, i ) = Cmplx( am->smooth, am->smooth );
00123         }
00124         break;
00125     }
00126 }
00127 
00128 AMD newAMD( REAL samprate, REAL f_initial, REAL f_lobound, REAL f_hibound,
00129             REAL f_bandwid, int size, COMPLEX * ivec, COMPLEX * ovec,
00130             AMMode mode, char *tag )
00131 {
00132     AMD am = ( AMD ) safealloc( 1, sizeof( AMDDesc ), tag );
00133 
00134     am->size = size;
00135     am->ibuf = newCXB( size, ivec, tag );
00136     am->obuf = newCXB( size, ovec, tag );
00137     am->mode = mode;
00138     init_pll( am, samprate, f_initial, f_lobound, f_hibound, f_bandwid );
00139 
00140     am->lock.curr = 0.5;
00141     am->lock.prev = 1.0;
00142     am->dc = 0.0;
00143 
00144     return am;
00145 }
00146 
00147 void delAMD( AMD am )
00148 {
00149     if ( am )
00150     {
00151         delCXB( am->ibuf );
00152         delCXB( am->obuf );
00153         safefree( ( char * ) am );
00154     }
00155 }
